snippet: Musicians, artists, activists and others will deconstruct images of black women in popular culture in a panel discussion at the Brooklyn Museum.
lead_paragraph: Musicians, artists, activists and others will deconstruct images of black women in popular culture in a panel discussion at the Brooklyn Museum.

headline.main: ‘Diva’? Deconstructing Pop Images of Black Women
headline.print_headline: ‘Diva’? Deconstructing Pop Images of Black Women
